laws.name: First Degree Murder
laws.description: Unlawful killing of a human with premeditation.

laws.name: Armed Robbery
laws.description: Taking property by force using a deadly weapon.

laws.name: Aggravated Battery
laws.description: Intentional touch or strike causing great bodily harm.

laws.name: Grand Theft Auto
laws.description: Unlawful taking of a motor vehicle.

laws.name: Possession with Intent
laws.description: Possession of a controlled substance in amount for distribution.

laws.name: Reckless Driving
laws.description: Driving with willful or wanton disregard for safety.

laws.name: DUI
laws.description: Operating a vehicle under the influence of alcohol or drugs.

laws.name: Poaching Out of Season
laws.description: Taking wildlife outside of established legal seasons.

laws.name: Fishing Without License
laws.description: Engaging in fishing activities without valid state permit.
